# UCE HELIO
[color=#a4885c]Hull Configuration:[/color] Small, Foreside Docking
[color=#a4885c]Crew Slots:[/color] 1 Captain
[color=#a4885c]Power System:[/color] Solar Array and 3 SMES batteries
[color=#a4885c]Atmospherics:[/color] Air canisters
[color=#a4885c]Weapons:[/color] None
[color=#a4885c]IFF Designation:[/color] Civilian
""Manufactured by the UCE, the Helio is a small personal transport shuttle. It's environmentally friendly solar array allows for long-term operation at minimal cost.""
